data: {"generalSituation":"Winds will be weak over Guangdong today and tomorrow. The weather will be warm during the day and relatively humid in the morning and at night over the region. The easterly airstream is expected to persistently affect the coast of southern China early to midweek next week. It will be cloudier with light rain and humid over the region. A trough of low pressure will affect southern China in the latter part of next week. There will be a few showers over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260221","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"East to southeast force 2 to 3.","forecastWeather":"Sunny periods.
